stimulusHtml: The repeated installation of Yayoi Kusama’s Narcissus Garden after its initial appearance in 1966 changed the original interpretation of the work by
choicesHtml: shifting the work’s focus from critiquing to participating in art as a commodity
revealing Kusama’s decision to voluntarily live out her life in a mental hospital
illuminating how the artist transformed modernist aesthetics in her work
making it possible for the work to be recognized as political commentary
